name: NabinLeap
_source: speak;Nabin;I have to see for myself, are you worthy...?|I have to... clear all this doubt, the only way I know how.
speak;Leap;Please! You don't have to do this...
speak;Nabin;I'm sorry, but this will determine... what I have to do.
speak;Leap;I understand doubt, fear...|Do what you must, but please be true to yourself...
